languages.text: "Безусловно, Лорд-капитан! Странствовать через варп без навигатора — дурная затея. Правда, придется подождать, прежде чем нам доставят нового проводника через Имматериум..."
"Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."
languages.original_text: "Безусловно, Лорд-капитан! Странствовать через варп без навигатора — дурная затея. Правда, придется подождать, прежде чем нам доставят нового проводника через Имматериум..."

traits.locale_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."
"Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."
"Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

"Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."
"Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

languages.text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain! Reisen durch das Immaterium ohne Navigator sind eine Torheit. Leider müssen wir noch einige Zeit warten, bis ein Nachfolger eintrifft ..."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Lord Captain! Reisen durch das Immaterium ohne Navigator sind eine Torheit. Leider müssen wir noch einige Zeit warten, bis ein Nachfolger eintrifft ..."

languages.text: « Je le comprends bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Il faudrait être fou pour voyager dans l'Immaterium sans navigateur. Malheureusement, nous allons devoir patienter un certain temps avant l'arrivée de notre nouveau guide... »
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: « Je le comprends bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Il faudrait être fou pour voyager dans l'Immaterium sans navigateur. Malheureusement, nous allons devoir patienter un certain temps avant l'arrivée de notre nouveau guide... »

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人！若是在没有导航者的情况下穿越亚空间，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。遗憾的是，在新的导航者抵达之前，我们恐怕要等上一段时间……”
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人！若是在没有导航者的情况下穿越亚空间，那恐怕就太愚蠢了。遗憾的是，在新的导航者抵达之前，我们恐怕要等上一段时间……”

languages.text: 「かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン！航宙士なしで非物質世界を航行するなど愚行の極みですからな。ですが、新しい案内人が来るまではしばらく待たねばなりません…」
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: 「かしこまりました、ロード・キャプテン！航宙士なしで非物質世界を航行するなど愚行の極みですからな。ですが、新しい案内人が来るまではしばらく待たねばなりません…」

languages.text: «¡Por supuesto, Lord Capitán! No tendría sentido atravesar el Inmaterio sin un navegante. Por desgracia, tendremos que esperar un tiempo hasta que llegue nuestro nuevo guía...».
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Por supuesto, Lord Capitán! No tendría sentido atravesar el Inmaterio sin un navegante. Por desgracia, tendremos que esperar un tiempo hasta que llegue nuestro nuevo guía...».

languages.text: "Kesinlikle Lord Kaptan! Tindiyar'da Rotacısız seyahat etmek ahmaklık olur. Ne yazık ki yeni kılavuzumuzun gelmesine biraz daha zaman var."
languages.original_text: "Certainly, Lord Captain! Travelling through the Immaterium without a Navigator is folly. Alas, we will have to wait for some time before our new guide arrives..."

traits.locale_text: "Kesinlikle Lord Kaptan! Tindiyar'da Rotacısız seyahat etmek ahmaklık olur. Ne yazık ki yeni kılavuzumuzun gelmesine biraz daha zaman var."
